roleOverview: UI/UX Designers create intuitive, accessible, and visually effective digital experiences by combining user research, interaction design, and interface craft.
requiredSkills: Tools like Figma and collaboration with developers
beginnerStage: Study UX principles, design thinking, and human-centered design
Create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups for simple products
Run basic user interviews and summarize findings
intermediateStage: Build end-to-end case studies with research, flows, and prototypes
Design responsive UI patterns and reusable components
Work with product and engineering teams on real release cycles
advancedStage: Lead UX strategy across multiple product surfaces
Define and scale design systems for consistency and speed
Drive experimentation and KPI-focused experience improvements
realWorldProjects: E-commerce checkout flow optimization with A/B testing
salaryInsights: Compensation grows with portfolio quality, domain expertise, and measurable impact on activation, retention, and conversion metrics.
